install.name: Handout - Notify
install.author: Kontent Design
install.copyright: This extension is released under the GNU/GPL License
install.description: This plug-in will notify the site owner when someone uploads, edits or downloads a file in Handout. Don't forget to publish it and specify at least one e-mail address.

param.name: cc
param.label: Send to
param.description: Send a notification to these e-mail addresses. Separate by a pipe |.

param.name: onupload_site
param.label: Notify on upload (site)
param.description: Send a notification when someone uploads a file through the front-end.

param.name: onedit_site
param.label: Notify on edit (site)
param.description: Send a notification when someone edits a file through the front-end.

param.name: ondownload_site
param.label: Notify on download (site)
param.description: Send a notification when someone downloads a file through the front-end.

param.name: onedit_admin
param.label: Notify on edit (admin)
param.description: Send a notification when someone edits a file through the back-end.
